ops.js:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Cloud}
“Hmm…Junon.”{PAUSE}“I'd love to get my hands on a submarine
right now.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
“Yeah! I could go for that!
Let's go to {CYAN}the submarine dock{WHITE}
under Junon!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Tifa}
“Just in time!”{PAUSE}“Come on! Let's go to the airport!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Tifa}
“There should only be a few guards now.”{PAUSE}“It might be safe to go to
{CYAN}the submarine dock{WHITE} under Junon.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Red XIII}
“Ugh. It's salty!
Let's go to the airport!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // {Red XIII}
“I would like to ride it!
Let's get one from {CYAN}the submarine dock{WHITE}
beneath Junon!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Cid}
“God!! I'm drenched!”{PAUSE}“Hurry up! Let's get to the airport!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Cid}
“You want it? Then you got it!
They're down at {CYAN}the submarine dock{WHITE}
underneath Junon!
You gotta get what you want while you can!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Yuffie}
“Phew…
The air up here's great!”{PAUSE}“Hey!
Let's go to the airport!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // {Yuffie}
“…Yeah!!”{PAUSE}“{CYAN}The submarine dock{WHITE} underneath Junon!
I can steal a sub easy enough,
but I can't pilot it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Cait Sith}
“Let's go to the airport!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // “Security's pretty light now!
The submarine's at {CYAN}the submarine dock{WHITE}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // “Looks like we made it.
You'll probably head for the airport, right?”
